attributes.action: Build Prisons abroad where land is cheaper to accommodate long serving criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need more prisons yet land is expensive in the UK so why not build prisons abroad to house criminals serving long sentences? This would then free up prisons in the UK so that criminals can be properly punished instead of having to release them early for good behaviour. This could save the taxpayer millions every year.
